title: Festival Outfits: Lace | Lord & Taylor
description:
Music festival season 2015 is in full swing.  We’ve checked it out and we’re adding lace wherever we can.  From lace shorts and dresses to lace crop tops and camisoles, these pieces make a statement.  Explore Lord & Taylor’s Design Lab for white lace dresses, tops, and more festival outfit ideas.  

Shop Now: http://bit.ly/music-festival-outfits
